name: One Button Hero (Radioactive Sean)
description:
Small game for the One Button Jam where you traverse across the lands to overthrow a castle. (I didn't have enough time for the last part :P)

Main Menu Controls:

- Hold spacebar to change selection
- Press button to select

Settings:

- Calibration: Takes average of some presses so the press speed for tapping or holding is more fine tuned to you
- Test: Allows you to try button presses to see if it feels to slow or too fast

Sorry there is no music, I don't know how to make any. I also procrastinated a lot so art looks bad and incomplete, and it's not very polished.
